entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
